remarks: Restricted "at most one" using explicit substitution.  (Contributed by NM, 4-Nov-2012.)  (Revised by NM, 16-Jun-2017.)  (Revised by Thierry Arnoux, 8-Oct-2017.)
statement:
rmo3f.1 $e |- F/_ x A $.
rmo3f.2 $e |- F/_ y A $.
rmo3f.3 $e |- F/ y ph $.
rmo3f $p |- ( E* x e. A ph <-> A. x e. A A. y e. A ( ( ph /\ [ y / x ] ph ) -> x = y ) ) $.
$d x y $.
